import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductItem = ({ item }) => { const onLikeProduct = (e) => { e.currentTarget.classList.toggle("product-mark-liked"); }; return (

{item.Name}

{item.Prize} đ

{Math.ceil( parseInt(item.Prize) - (parseInt(item.Prize) * parseInt(item.Promo)) / 100 )} đ

{/* product-mark-liked */} Đã bán {item.Saled}
{item.Promo}%

Yêu Thích

); }; export default ProductItem;
